name: Netherlands Pathogens Portal - Arboviruses
description: Datasets from Pathogens Portal Netherlands covering arboviruses in birds, serology, sequences, isolates, samples, experimental data, literature, and surveys.

fields.name: study
fields.value: Surveillance for arboviruses in birds in captivity in the Netherlands, 2016-2022

fields.name: dataset_name
fields.value: Data from captive birds including date of death and sampling, location, bird species, and molecular testing results for Usutu virus (USUV).

fields.name: study
fields.value: Surveillance for arboviruses in free-ranging live birds in the Netherlands, 2016-2022

fields.name: dataset_name
fields.value: Data from free-ranging live birds including date and location of sampling, bird species, and molecular testing results for USUV and West Nile virus (WNV).

fields.name: study
fields.value: Surveillance for arboviruses in free-ranging dead birds in the Netherlands, 2016-2022

fields.name: dataset_name
fields.value: Data from free-ranging dead birds including date and location of sampling, bird species, and molecular testing results for USUV and WNV.

fields.name: study
fields.value: Study of arboviruses in mosquitoes at bird ringing sites in the Netherlands, 2020-2022

fields.name: dataset_name
fields.value: Data from mosquitoes including sampling dates and locations, mosquito species, and molecular testing results for USUV and WNV.

fields.name: study
fields.value: Serosurveillance for arboviruses in free-ranging live birds in the Netherlands, 2016-2022

fields.name: dataset_name
fields.value: Serological testing results for USUV and WNV in free-ranging live birds, including date and location of sampling and bird species.

fields.name: study
fields.value: Multiantigen serology and diagnostic algorithm for arbovirus infections in southeast Europe

fields.name: dataset_name
fields.value: Serological data from hospitalized adults in southeast Europe, including ELISA, protein microarray, VNT, and IIFT results for multiple arboviruses.

fields.name: type_of_pathogen
fields.value: Crimean-Congo haemorrhagic fever virus (CCHFV), tick-borne encephalitis virus (TBEV), Toscana virus (TOSV), and West Nile virus (WNV)

fields.name: tags
fields.value: diagnostic algorithm, enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA), and custom-printed protein microarrays, confirmation assays (virus neutralization test (VNT), Indirect immunofluorescence test (IIFT))

fields.name: study
fields.value: Field serology of petting zoo and poultry chickens in the Netherlands, 2020-2022

fields.name: dataset_name
fields.value: Serological results for USUV and WNV, including date, location, and poultry species.

fields.value: Field serology of petting zoo and poultry chicken in the Netherlands (2020-2022)

fields.name: dataset_name
fields.value: Data on poultry chickens with serological evidence of WNV and USUV infections, including date, location, and poultry species.
